Legacy Document

Important: The information in this document is obsolete and should not be used for new development.

Inside Macintosh: Advanced Color Imaging on the Mac OS /

This Apple manual was written, edited, and composed on a desktop publishing system using Apple Macintosh computers and FrameMaker software. Line art was created using Adobe\x89 Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.

Steve Evangelou, Judy Melanson, Tony Francis, Michael Kline
